attributes.action: Initiate a specific national anthem for England - i.e. Land of Hope and Glory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For sporting events such as the  6 Nations Rugby tournament, England should have it's own national anthem. As Scotland, Ireland and Wales do.

God save the Queen is the anthem for Great Britain and its dominions.
It should still be played at events where Great Britian is represented.
But when there are inter British national matches then England should have it's own anthem

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/anthem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
